query.querystr: call c; assign a; while w; if i; stmt s; Select <a, c, i> such that Modifies (a, "delta") and Modifies (w, "x") and Modifies(c, "bravo") and Modifies(s, _) and Modifies(i, "b4") and Parent*(84, i)
procedure p, q; Select <p, q> such that Modifies (p, "apparentlyThisDoesNothing") and Modifies(q, "b")
query.stuans: A A,A B,A C,A F,B A,B B,B C,B F,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName A,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName B,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName C,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName F,F A,F B,F C,F F
query.correct: A A,A B,A C,A F,B A,B B,B C,B F,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName A,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName B,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName C,DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName F,F A,F B,F C,F F

query.querystr: if i; assign a; Select <a, i> such that Uses(a,"a") and Uses (a, "y") and Uses (i, "yy")
procedure p; call c; Select <p, c> such that Uses (p, "delta") and Uses(c, "delta")
procedure p, q; Select BOOLEAN such that Calls(p, q) and Calls(q, "DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName") with q.procName = "B"
procedure p, q; Select p such that Calls*(p, "DizIzAVeryLongLongProcProcProcName") and Calls*(_, q) with q.procName = "E"
stmt s1, s2, s3; assign a; Select s1 such that Parent(s1, s2) and Parent(s2, s3) and Parent(s3, a) with a.stmt# = 19

id.comment: Select the 2nd level parent or more of a call statement

query.querystr: stmt s1, s2, s3, s4; call c; Select s1 such that Parent*(s1, s2) and Parent*(s3, s4) and Parent*(s4, s2) and Parent(s2, c)

id.comment: Find a while loop that is followed by at least 2 statements

query.querystr: while w; stmt s1, s2; Select w such that Follows(w, s1) and Follows(s1, s2)

id.comment: Find an ordering of stmt --> while --> if in a single level

query.querystr: while w; if i; stmt s; Select <w, i, s> such that Follows*(s, w) and Follows*(w, i)

id.comment: Find all if statement that is executed after a while statement, and is a parent of some other if

query.querystr: while w; if i, k; call c; Select i such that Next(w, i) and Parent*(i, k)
while w1, w2; stmt s1, s2; call c; Select w1 such that Next*(w1, s1) and Next*(s1, w2) and Next*(w2, s2) and Next*(s2, c)
assign a1, a2, a3, a4; Select a1 such that Affects(a1, a2) and Affects(a2, a3) and Affects(a3, a4) and Affects(a4, a4)
assign a1, a2, a3, a4; Select a1 such that Affects*(a1, 31) and Affects*(a2, 31) and Affects*(a2, 27) and Affects*(14, a4) and Affects*(a4, a2) and Affects*(a2, a1)
stmt s; procedure p; variable v, x; Select <s, v> such that Calls(p, _) with p.procName = v.varName and p.procName = "B" such that Uses(s, x) with x.varName = "charlie"
assign a; while w; if i; variable v; Select <a, v> pattern a(_,"10") and w(v, _) and i(v,_,_)
assign a; while w; if i; variable v; Select <a, v> pattern a(_, _"y+5"_) and w(v,_) and i(v,_,_)
